snippet: Those beyond retirement age are not the only beneficiaries of Social Security. Children are among those whose payments would be reined in by a proposed change in the inflation formula.
abstract: Those beyond retirement age are not the only beneficiaries of Social Security. Children are among those whose payments would be reined in by a proposed change in the inflation formula.

headline.main: How Social Security Cuts Could Affect Children

keywords.name: organizations
